Employment Opportunity in SLSD:
Administrative Assistant to the Superintendent of Schools
This position serves as confidential Administrative Assistant to the Superintendent and is responsible for all clerical duties associated with the effective performance of duties of the Superintendent. This position requires the ability to assume responsibility, work effectively and independently under pressure and maintain confidentiality. This position assists with varied and complex clerical tasks involving superior judgment, discretion and confidentiality. This position assists with completion of administrative tasks often involving extensive contact with members of the public, local school district officials, with tact and discretion. This individual may also have opportunity to serve in the capacity of the Board Secretary. Please apply by September 1, 2020 at https://www.applitrack.com/slsd/onlineapp/default.aspx?Category=Secretarial%2fClerical

UPDATE on SLSD's Grab 'n Go Meal Program for the weeks of April 6 & 13: Three bagged lunches per student will be distributed on Monday April 6 and Thursday April 9. The district is closed on Monday April 13. Two bagged lunches per student will be distributed on Tuesday April 14 and Thursday April 16. Distribution will continue at all three sites: Hopewell, Liberty Bell and Southern Lehigh High School.

Given Governor Wolf’s recommendation to wear masks and continue physical distancing, the following will be in effect for our Grab ‘n Go Lunch Pick-Up:
1) Volunteers will continue to wear gloves and will now be wearing masks.
2) Orders will be taken from a six foot distance from the automobile.
3) Bagged lunches will be placed on a table for pick-up by the individual in the automobile.
4) Students no longer need to be present in the automobile to receive a lunch.
As a reminder, lunches are available to ALL STUDENTS in the SOUTHERN LEHIGH SCHOOL DISTRICT. Thank you and stay safe, SPARTANS! https://buff.ly/3bU3XzB.

Southern Lehigh School District Releases New Spartan Logo!

Have you ever noticed how many different logos are associated with Southern Lehigh? Well, it's a new year and the district has revealed a new, streamlined look with a uniquely designed Spartan and font that show the world we are Southern Lehigh.

Between now and the end of the year, you will start to see our new Spartan appearing around the district. The administrative team is currently working on a process for sharing the logo and font with clubs and organizations that support our students and activities. We appreciate your patience as we develop the processes and prepare to share them.

Thank you for your continued support and commitment to Southern Lehigh and the Spartans!
